Patients consent participate study randomize two rehabilitation group TKA : experimental ( virtual rehabilitation ) control ( traditional rehabilitation ) . In experimental arm 71 subject undergo virtual rehabilitation train post-surgical rehabilitation period , addition passive knee range motion device ( kinetec ) functional activity ( stair ) . In control arm : 71 subject similar demographic characteristic experimental arm undergo usual physiotherapy rehabilitation , addition passive knee range motion device ( kinetec ) functional activity ( stair ) . Both control study intervention provide 60 minute daily session . General status patient undertake follow outcome baseline 10 day surgery ( discharge ) .
